alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 1:04PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, west central Clarendon, northeastern Barnwell, Bamberg, south central Lexington, southwestern Sumter, east central Aiken and Orangeburg Counties through 145 PM EST... At 104 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Aiken State Park to near Barnwell. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Barnwell, Bamberg, Denmark, Brookdale, Williston, Blackville, St. Matthews, Branchville, Bowman, Elloree, Santee State Park, Claflin College, South Carolina State University, Orangeburg County Airport, Barnwell State Park, Edisto Gardens, Wagener, North and Springfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 133 and 168. Interstate 95 near mile marker 85. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Calhoun; Central Orangeburg; Clarendon; Lexington; Northwestern Orangeburg; Southeastern Orangeburg; Sumter
